subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Anthony Kim, the talented 23-year-old who is ranked No. 5 in the FedEx Cup points list, found both birds and bees at the third hole at Ridgewood Country Club on Thursday.
snippet: Anthony Kim, the talented 23-year-old who is ranked No. 5 in the FedEx Cup points list, found both birds and bees at the third hole at Ridgewood Country Club on Thursday.
